H0.text: Where in Canada is the Lion's Gate bridge. Toronto

H1.text: Where in Canada is the Lion's Gate bridge. Calgary

H2.text: Where in Canada is the Lion's Gate bridge. Montreal

H3.text: Where in Canada is the Lion's Gate bridge. Vancouvr

A4.text: The Lions Gate Bridge connects the City of Vancouver, British Columbia, to the North Shore municipalities of the District of North Vancouver, the City of North Vancouver, and West Vancouver.
